jasima.core.expExecution

类 ForkJoinPoolExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.expExecution.ExperimentExecutor
      • jasima.core.expExecution.ForkJoinPoolExecutor

  • public class ForkJoinPoolExecutor
extends ExperimentExecutor
    An implementation of ExperimentExecutor using a ForkJoinPool (introduced in Java 1.7) to execute tasks. This pretty much simplifies code compared to ThreadPoolExecutor, as we don't have to care about possible starvation of worker threads waiting for sub-experiments to complete.
    版本:
    "$Id$"
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt, 2012-09-05

      • runExperiment

        public ExperimentFuture runExperiment(Experiment e,
                                      Experiment parent)
        从类复制的说明: ExperimentExecutor
        Runs an experiment usually in an asynchronous ways. Therefore an ExperimentFuture is returned to access results once they become available.
        指定者:
        runExperiment 在类中 ExperimentExecutor
        参数:
        e - The experiment to execute.
        parent - The parent experiment of "e". This might be null.
        返回:
        An ExperimentFuture to access experiment results.

      • shutdownNow

        public void shutdownNow()
        从类复制的说明: ExperimentExecutor
        Shuts down this ExperimentExecutor.
        指定者:
        shutdownNow 在类中 ExperimentExecutor
